function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"High mortality rates in vulnerable populations, unprecedented global health, social, and economic challenges","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective public health strategies, vaccination campaigns, and international collaboration","Technologies":"Information technologies, digital communication platforms, social media monitoring tools","People":"Global population, vulnerable populations, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, international organizations"},{"Description":"Polarized and negative news coverage of the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Elicits negative emotions, increases risk of adverse physical and mental health problems","Mitigation":"Promotion of balanced and fact-based reporting, development of media literacy programs","Technologies":"Media monitoring tools, sentiment analysis algorithms","People":"General public, news media organizations","Owner":"News agencies, public health organizations, educational institutions"}]}
